Novus

A component-based framework for powerful web games

Get Started on GitHub ›

What is It?

Novus is a game engine dedicated to bringing quality games to the web. JavaScript is great, but without a good foundation, building an entire game can be a tough task. Novus looks to simplify the process through extensibility and robustness.

Another Game Engine?

Other game engines tend to focus on features without a plan for extensibility and system architecture. Novus is built to be component-based from the ground up, allowing your game's code to be manageable the entire way. No more long extension chains and hard to change code!
